content: Session Complete - Comprehensive site quality assessment finished. Quality score 53/100, fixed all critical bugs (empty equipment types, duplicate JSX attributes, 4 crash fixes). Production stable at shearfrac-rig-operations.vercel.app. Used 7 MCP tools: complete-test, chrome-devtools, knowledge-graph, memory-bank, github, pagespeed (rate limited), language-server. Deployed 2 commits. Memory Bank initialized with full project context. Recommendations: PageSpeed audit, code splitting, accessibility fixes, image optimization. All 17+ MCP servers configured globally at ~/.mcp.json.
